name: Little Maplehold
description:
The Game

Little Maplehold is a cute stylized game about a small soldier fighting against the black knights, who threat a helpless village.

Help the poor people in the village and rebuild their homes, which got destroyed by the black knights.

Get stronger and find new and better weapons. Take care of yourself in this cute but dangerous world.

Features

Cool fighting system featuring swords and bows.

Take a break in the beautiful world of Little Maplehold.

Help the characters and solve many quests.

Controls

The controls are very easy to understand:

WASD = Moving, E = Picking up items/Interacting with people, Space = Jumping

Fighting mechanics

Equip a weapon in the inventory (Press I for accessing the inventory). The bow needs arrows in order to work. You can draw the bow by holding the left mouse key. You can hold the right mouse key for blocking attacks with your shield, if you have a sword equipped. Blocking and attacking will cost stamina!

Notes from the developer

Dear player, I hope you will enjoy this preview of Little Maplehold. This game is a preview and not a full game, it will take some time, but a true release with a cool story will follow soon. The current release is not optimized for 4K or WQHD, but a fix will follow soon :)

It makes a lot of fun to create a game, but I need your help. Send me your ideas/suggestions into our discord. Discord link: https://discord.gg/52ttMPzGhB

This is a preview! Full release will be available soon!
